Title: 35824 - Top # Neighborhoods in New York Close to the Action
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 top neighborhoods in New York City to stay as a tourist to be close to the major attractions. Ideas may include staying in Chelsea to be close to Penn Station, hotels near Times Square, or hotels in the Upper West Side near Central Park. Include the main client link when mentioning NYC hotels. This also should include one neighborhood near a sporting venue such as Yankee Stadium or Madison Square Garden to include the secondary client link.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.

Title: 35825 - Discovering the Big Apple on a Budget
Direction: 500 Words; In 3-6 subheaders, this article will examine how to visit New York City without spending a fortune. Ideas can include staying in more affordable neighborhoods than Manhattan or considering staying in New Jersey. You may also include ideas for getting affordable tickets for Broadway, or finding deals on sporting events (this is where you can include the secondary client link). Avoid mentioning hostels, VRBO, AirBnB, or any other hotel competitors to IHG. Should be directed toward younger travelers on a budget. Include a natural link to the main client link when mentioning hotel stays.
Extra Writer Notes: A link to Touring NYC Sports will be included in this article. Please bold the anchor text you'd like to use for this link.
